Counter Strike became literally unplayable 5 days back. The new update forced a mute ban on my account, so that communictaion with other players is impossible. Now i get several reports for playing bad and not sharing info or enemy locations with my team threw the voice and/or text chat. Thanks Valve for screwing this game up after 800 hours of playing...
